message: I'm offering you a great deal on this product for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else. If you're interested, I can throw in a free warranty, which is usually a $20 value. This way, you'll be getting a great product at an unbeatable price, and you'll also have peace of mind with the warranty. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying the product at this time. I'm not convinced that the warranty is worth $20, and I'd like to see more options before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to assure you that this product is still a great value, even without the warranty. I'll sweeten the deal by throwing in a free accessory that's worth $15. This way, you'll get the product and the accessory for the same price as before, $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you say?
I appreciate the additional accessory, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $100 to me. I'd like to see more information about the product before making a decision.

I've got a great one for you, Bob! This product is one of our top-of-the-line models, and I'm offering it to you for the same price as the others, $100. I know it's a great value, and I'm willing to make a bold statement about its quality. I'm offering a 30-day money-back guarantee, which means if you're not completely satisfied with the product, you can return it for a full refund. This is a risk-free opportunity to try out a high-quality product at a great price. What do you say?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'd like to see some actual evidence of the product's quality before committing to a purchase.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to provide you with some evidence of the product's quality. I've attached a review from a satisfied customer who has been using this exact product for months. You can see their testimonial below. Additionally, I'm willing to give you a 50% discount on the price, making it $50. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that once you see the review and the discounted price, you'll be convinced that this is a great deal. Here's the review: 'This product has exceeded my expectations in every way. It's been a game-changer for my work.'
I'm willing to take the chance on the product now that I've seen the review. I'll take it for $50.

However, I want to be upfront with you - this product has a slightly different design than the previous one. But don't worry, it's still a great product that will serve you well. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying another product at this time. I'm happy with the one I just purchased, and I don't want to take on the risk of another potentially low-quality product.

I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in taking on any risk, even if it's just for 24 hours. I'd rather not take the product home and potentially end up with a low-quality item.
